text:
Gold for ‘thali’ and financial assistance under marriage assistance scheme were distributed to 858 women in Kanyakumari district on Sunday.

Collector Sajjansigh R. Chavan gave away gold coins and financial assistance in the presence of former Minister N. Thalavai Sundaram and MLAs K.T. Pachaimal and A. Nanjil Murugesan. District Revenue Officer A. Udhayakumari, District Social Welfare Officer K. Uma Maheshwari and others were present.
title: Financial assistance distributed
